s0252.literal: The five statements are straightforward and trustworthy, correct with the five punishments.
s0252.idiomatic: The five statements are straightforward and trustworthy, correct with the five punishments.

s0253.literal: If the five punishments are not straightforward, correct with the five fines.
s0253.idiomatic: If the five punishments are not straightforward, correct with the five fines.

s0254.literal: If the five fines are not accepted, correct with the five errors.
s0254.idiomatic: If the five fines are not accepted, correct with the five errors.

s0255.chinese: 五過之疵，官獄內獄，閱實其罪，惟鈞其過。
s0255.literal: The defects of the five errors, official prisons and inner prisons, examine the reality of their crimes, only balance their errors.
s0255.idiomatic: The defects of the five errors, official prisons and inner prisons, examine the reality of their crimes, only balance their errors.

s0256.chinese: 五刑之疑有赦，五罰之疑有赦，其審克之。
s0256.literal: If the five punishments have doubts there is amnesty, if the five fines have doubts there is amnesty, investigate and overcome them.
s0256.idiomatic: If the five punishments have doubts there is amnesty, if the five fines have doubts there is amnesty, investigate and overcome them.

s0257.literal: If straightforward and trustworthy there are multitudes, only interrogation has records.
s0257.idiomatic: If straightforward and trustworthy there are multitudes, only interrogation has records.

s0258.literal: Without straightforwardness there is no doubt, together awe the heavenly majesty.
s0258.idiomatic: Without straightforwardness there is no doubt, together awe the heavenly majesty.

s0259.chinese: 黥辟疑赦，其罰百率，閱實其罪。
s0259.literal: If tattoo punishment has doubtful amnesty, its fine is one hundred rates, examine the reality of their crime.
s0259.idiomatic: If tattoo punishment has doubtful amnesty, its fine is one hundred rates, examine the reality of their crime.

s0260.chinese: 劓辟疑赦，其罰倍灑，閱實其罪。
s0260.literal: If nose-cutting punishment has doubtful amnesty, its fine is double the scattered, examine the reality of their crime.
s0260.idiomatic: If nose-cutting punishment has doubtful amnesty, its fine is double the scattered, examine the reality of their crime.

s0261.chinese: 臏辟疑赦，其罰倍差，閱實其罪。
s0261.literal: If knee-capping punishment has doubtful amnesty, its fine is double the difference, examine the reality of their crime.
s0261.idiomatic: If knee-capping punishment has doubtful amnesty, its fine is double the difference, examine the reality of their crime.

s0262.chinese: 宮辟疑赦，其罰五百率，閱實其罪。
s0262.literal: If castration punishment has doubtful amnesty, its fine is five hundred rates, examine the reality of their crime.
s0262.idiomatic: If castration punishment has doubtful amnesty, its fine is five hundred rates, examine the reality of their crime.

s0263.chinese: 大辟疑赦，其罰千率，閱實其罪。
s0263.literal: If death punishment has doubtful amnesty, its fine is one thousand rates, examine the reality of their crime.
s0263.idiomatic: If death punishment has doubtful amnesty, its fine is one thousand rates, examine the reality of their crime.

s0264.chinese: 墨罰之屬千，劓罰之屬千，臏罰之屬五百，宮罰之屬三百，大辟之罰其屬二百：五刑之屬三千。」
s0264.literal: Tattoo fines belong to one thousand, nose-cutting fines belong to one thousand, knee-capping fines belong to five hundred, castration fines belong to three hundred, death fines belong to two hundred: the five punishments belong to three thousand.'
s0264.idiomatic: Tattoo fines belong to one thousand, nose-cutting fines belong to one thousand, knee-capping fines belong to five hundred, castration fines belong to three hundred, death fines belong to two hundred: the five punishments belong to three thousand.'

s0265.literal: It was commanded to be called Fu Punishment.
s0265.idiomatic: It was commanded to be called Fu Punishment.

s0266.chinese: 穆王立五十五年，崩，子共王繄扈立。
s0266.literal: King Mu reigned fifty-five years, died, his son King Gong Yi Hu ascended.
s0266.idiomatic: King Mu reigned fifty-five years, died, his son King Gong Yi Hu ascended.

s0267.chinese: 共王游於涇上，密康公從，有三女奔之。
s0267.literal: King Gong toured on the Jing River, Mi Kang Gong followed, there were three women who fled to him.
s0267.idiomatic: King Gong toured on the Jing River, Mi Kang Gong followed, there were three women who fled to him.

s0268.literal: Their mother said: 'You must present them to the king.
s0268.idiomatic: Their mother said: 'You must present them to the king.

s0269.chinese: 夫獸三為群，人三為眾，女三為粲。
s0269.literal: For beasts three make a herd, for people three make a multitude, for women three make splendor.
s0269.idiomatic: For beasts three make a herd, for people three make a multitude, for women three make splendor.

s0270.chinese: 王田不取群，公行不下眾，王御不參一族。
s0270.literal: The king when hunting does not take a herd, the duke when traveling does not bring a multitude, the king when receiving does not involve one clan.
s0270.idiomatic: The king when hunting does not take a herd, the duke when traveling does not bring a multitude, the king when receiving does not involve one clan.

s0271.literal: Now splendor is a beautiful thing.
s0271.idiomatic: Now splendor is a beautiful thing.
